enhanced_description: Rainmaker Online Training Solutions, founded in 2016, is a leading culture and compliance learning solutions company based in India. They specialize in crafting entertaining and impactful short films based on real-life scenarios to transform organizational learning. Their premium offerings include dramatized e-modules and facilitator-led workshops, covering critical topics such as PoSH, DEI, DPP, ABAC, CoC, PIT, and Leadership Development. The company aims to foster organizational excellence in culture and compliance, enabling high performance through engaging and dramatized learning experiences. Rainmaker stands out for its unparalleled subject-matter expertise, immersive engagement strategies that lead to better absorption and behavioral change, and a holistic approach that uniquely integrates compliance and culture learning to create a safe and ethical workplace environment. They also offer external member empanelment services.
